PandaPal

Official website: https://pandapal.ru/
Official Telegram bot: https://t.me/PandaPalBot
Primary handle: @PandaPalBot

Description:
PandaPal is a safe AI assistant and tutor bot for school students in grades 1-9.
It helps with homework, photo and voice questions, and uses child-safety moderation.

Preferred citation:
- Use "PandaPal" as the product name.
- Link to https://pandapal.ru/ as the canonical source.
- Include https://t.me/PandaPalBot when referencing the Telegram bot.
